skillTree.localised_description: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Soaked in and toughened by embalming fluid, the cloth bindings used to mummify afford the wearer additional protection from all but a direct hit from mortal projectiles.
The fluid used to embalm the Tomb King toughens his bindings, enabling him to withstand a greater degree of damage than would otherwise be possible.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The firstborn son of a Tomb King is given to the gods, where he may serve the future itself as part of the Mortuary Cult.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -15
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: The second son of a second son shall succeed his father when the time comes. It is the custom.
The younger sons of a Tomb King command detachments within his armies, ensuring their father's unshakeable, iron will is enacted to the letter.
The Faceless one lurks in the desert watching and ready to strike.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -1%
	(all characters factionwide)
Melee attack: +4 when fighting in desert terrain
Speed: +10% when in own or allied territory

skillTree.localised_description: I am the bringer of justice and truth.

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.
Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit: death.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Death is not an impedance to the strongest of wills.
Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: The undead are constantly on guard, and always vigilant.
Hidden in the desert, below the shifting sands, are the remnants of ancient barracks, still stocked with Nehekharan supplies.
The tales of this Prince's legion have been spread far and wide. Their banner induces dread in their foes.

effects.description:
Leadership: -1 when attacking
	(enemy armies in province)

Leadership: -2 when attacking
	(enemy armies in province)

Leadership: -3 when attacking
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: For millennia, the Tomb Prince has guarded Nehekhara.
They're not running away. Maybe this was a bad idea.

effects.description:
Leadership: -1 during ambushes
	(enemy armies in province)

Melee attack: -1 during ambushes
	(enemy armies in province)

Leadership: -2 during ambushes
	(enemy armies in province)

Melee attack: -2 during ambushes
	(enemy armies in province)

Leadership: -3 during ambushes
	(enemy armies in province)

Melee attack: -3 during ambushes
	(enemy armies in province)

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero
Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.
We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!
The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.
You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending 
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 5%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
These jars contain the remains of many Liche Priests, which are useful for raising and binding a new force.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The people of the desert live and die by their oaths in Basth's graceful sight.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 5% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Benevolent Tahoth imparts sacred knowledge and timeless wisdom to his people.
The Tomb Kings and their servants feel Khsar's wrath coursing through their Unliving veins.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +10% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Time itself cannot harm those who have defied death.

effects.description:
Armour: +5 for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Effective chariot warfare requires precise control - choreography, almost, if you will - if the victories sought by Unliving generals are to be achieved.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for Tomb Barque, Skeleton Chariot and Skeleton Archer Chariot units
	(Hero's army)
Melee attack: +10 on Skeleton Chariot mount
Melee defence: +10 on Skeleton Chariot mount

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The ties that hold man and beast together cannot be broken by death alone.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for Skeletal Horsemen, Nehekhara Horsemen, Sepulchral Stalkers and Necropolis Knights units
	(Hero's army)
Melee attack: +10 on Skeletal Steed mount
Melee defence: +10 on Skeletal Steed mount

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The myriad Undead legions respond to their master's will without question.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for Nehekhara Warriors, Skeleton Warriors, Skeleton Spearmen, Skeleton Archers and Tomb Guard units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Revered One, Venerable One, Lord of Secrets, High Priest of the Temple of Years…"

effects.description:
Spell resistance: 10% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(all units in army)
